mapper.insert: INSERT INTO meetingroom_file ( mee_no, original_name, file_name, kind, size, ext ) VALUES ( #{meeNo}, #{originalName}, #{fileName}, #{kind}, #{size}, #{ext} )

mname = #{mname},
capacity = #{capacity},
info = #{info},
update_date = NOW()
